LanguageData.WAW.Welcome.Desc: Thank you for playing this mod, for more information please refer to workshop page. \nIf you want to report bugs please goto the bug reproting thread in the workshop
LanguageData.factionLosing: This faction is losing the war, sooner or later they will collpase.
LanguageData.factionStrikeToSurvive: This faction barely stands, they have suffered from continues military failures.
LanguageData.factionWillingToFight: This faction suffered some losses, but they are willing to fight.
LanguageData.factionHungerForWar: This faction beleives they are the winning side.
LanguageData.WAW.DefeatWarbandLetter.Label: hostile warband defeated
LanguageData.WAW.DefeatWarbandLetter.Desc: We defeated a hostile warband! It's not a noticeable achievement, but another malicious attempt of {0} has been stopped.
LanguageData.WAW.InvalidObject: we are not attacking this one, sorry.
LanguageData.WAW.FarObject: we cannot reach that far, sir, ten tiles for the most.
LanguageData.WAW.NoMembers: No one in this warband is able to fight.
LanguageData.WAW.WaitForCooldown: Sorry, we won't be avialable in next {0} days.
LanguageData.WAW.WarbandLoss: This warband has permanently lost a member, recruit new from recruiting window.
LanguageData.WAW.LostWarband.Desc: Everyone is dead, the entire warband is destroyed.
LanguageData.WAW.tooltip: Re-select equipped apparel to unequip it.
LanguageData.WAW.tooltip1: Select another weapon to unequip current weapon.
LanguageData.WAW.Title: Warband Warfare Update Log
LanguageData.WAW.Desc: 5/Dec/2024: Allows player to create custom troops, you can find troop customization panel in the main panel. \nAll player created troops will be displayed in cyan in troop selection panel.
LanguageData.WAW.DefenseSuccussful.Desc: This warband has repelled an enemy assault, it's time to make everyone retreat and close the map.
LanguageData.WAW.WarbandLeak: You cannot recruit more than {0} warbands, please go to the settings if you need more.
LanguageData.WAW.RaidPlayerWarband.Desc: Your warbands are considered as a threat by {0} from {1} and they have decided to raid one of your warbands as a warning. \nNow you will have to eliminate all threats before the map can be closed. \n(You may try to cut the amount of your eatablished warbands or go to the settings to lower the rates of such events.)
LanguageData.WAW.WarbandCreated.Desc: After days of recruiting members, your warband is set for a real fight.
LanguageData.WAW.CannotConfigureWarband: Cannot configure warband in following {0} days.
LanguageData.WAW.LeaderSet.Desc: {0} has become the leader of a warband, the warband will stay alive as long as {2} is alive, you can still send {1} back by dismissing the warband.
LanguageData.WAW.WeakBand: There should be at least five members.
LanguageData.WAW.NoComms: There's no powered comms console in your colony.
LanguageData.WAW.CaravanWarband.Desc: If you are never going to build a comms console, you will have to use a cravan to create a warband and make one colonist the leader of the warband, before doing that, make sure the caravan has enough silvers.
LanguageData.WAW.AboutAssignLeader.Desc: You can assign a leader for this newly crated warband, to do this, you only need a caravan that can approach the warband site.
LanguageData.WAW.AboutQuickAttack.Desc: You can access raid shortcut window through the main mod panel, it makes it easier to select from active warbands.
